Title: Gamma World, Part 1
Director: Vinton Heuck, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Writer: Joshua Fine (story), Michael Ryan, Christopher Yost (story)
Actors: Brian Bloom, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Eric Loomis, Chris Cox
Plot: When the Leader creates a bubble of gamma radiation emanating from the Cube that mutates any human it touches, the Avengers team up with Doc Sampson to stop him. Meanwhile, Hawkeye infiltrates a Hydra base in order to capture Black Widow.
